meanings.definition: Affected by bad luck or misfortune.
meanings.sent1: The snakebitten team lost every game this season.
meanings.sent2: She felt snakebitten after missing the bus and spilling her coffee.
meanings.sent3: The snakebitten student forgot their homework on the day of the surprise quiz.
meanings.sent4: His snakebitten streak continued as he tripped over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent5: The snakebitten farmer's crops were ruined by a sudden hailstorm.

meanings.definition: Having a string of bad luck or unfortunate events.
meanings.sent1: The snakebitten traveler missed their flight, lost their luggage, and got food poisoning.
meanings.sent2: The snakebitten family faced one problem after another during their vacation.
meanings.sent3: Feeling snakebitten, she accidentally deleted her important work presentation.
meanings.sent4: The snakebitten marathon runner twisted their ankle just before the race.
meanings.sent5: The snakebitten actor forgot their lines and tripped on stage during the play.

meanings.sent1: The snakebitten house seemed to always have something break or go wrong.
meanings.sent2: He felt snakebitten when his car broke down on the way to the job interview.
meanings.sent3: The snakebitten cat knocked over a vase, spilling water all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion was rumored to be snakebitten, with strange occurrences happening inside.
meanings.sent5: The snakebitten athlete stumbled at the start line of every race.
